{% if colgate_ng_language_options == 'Others' and colgate_ng_other_language == '1' %}_[Q No. 2/2 ]_
Batutuwan da aka zaba: Hakora Masu Karfi 
Zaɓi tambayoyin cikin jerin da ke ƙasa, don samun shawarwarin kula da baki

 1. Hakora masu kwari
 2. Baki mai Lafiya
 3. Shawarar Goge baki
 4. Wane man goge baki{%else%}_[Q No. 2/2 ]_
Selected Topic: Keeping teeth strong

 Choose an option

 1. Strong teeth
 2. Healthy mouth
 3. Brushing advice
 4. Which toothpaste to use{%endif%}
